meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sweet</radical> radical and the <kanji>sweet</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Double sweet.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>sweet</kanji>, sweet sensation is almost overwhelming. You gotta put on some sweet resistant <reading>armor</reading> (あま) to protect you from all that sweetness. The armor will prevent you from having a sweet, sweet sweetness overload.
